TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_U-al-pan-al-se, title = U-al-pan-al-se, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/U-al-pan-al-se} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == U-al-pan-al-se烏爾班二世 cen-bu-cyaw-cunng U-al-pan-al-se "kamu nu Latin, Beatus Urbanus PP. II, kamu nu Ing-kow, Pope Urban II, 1042 a mihcaan-1099 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 29 a mih caan", paabelin aca tu U-al-pan-al-se, uyaan a nganganci La-ze-liay a Aw-tow "Odo of Lagery". i Ba-kow Ma-en tukus nu sa'wac a lecuhen, ngangasawan u 1088 a mihcaan tulu a bulad 12 a demiad katukuh 1099 a mihca 7 a bulad 29 a demiad mala cyaw-cung. :Beatus Urbanus PP. II；英語:Pope Urban II；1042年—1099年7月29日), (Odo of Lagery). . nilaculan namala sakatusa cu-cyaw nu Lan-s , Ke-li-ni-ing-syu-s-atu yen-cang, nu satalakaway nu cu-cyaw "sumanahay ku zikuc ku cu-cyaw", Low-ma ci-yaw-hwang "1088-1099 a mihcaan", cung-se-ci nu sepatay a La-tin sipu. mala nu Low-ma cyaw-hwang hawsa palecal tu sakacecay ziwzika sulit a hitay mingayaw, balaki tu sa i Low-ma ku kalihalay mauzip. 10042 a lecuh i Ba-kow nu Ma-en tukus a sa'wac Ti-yung, nu tizaay Ma-en tukus a sa'wac nu Ti-yung u ilic nu kakitaan a luma'. saayaw i1050 a mihcaan i La-s cu-cyaway nu tabakiay a kiwkay nu cadudadan minanam, zikuz tayza I Su-wa-sung micudad, i 1055-1067 a mihcaan mala nu La-s nu pasubana'ay nu miedapay tu mikeliday nu patududay. 1070 a mihcaan miliyas tu La-s, micumud tu Ke-li-ni-ing-siw-yen mala siw-s, migingkiw tu ciwlu a cudad, zikuz mala yen-cung tu. 1079 a mihcaad ci U-al-pan-al-s kanamuhan nu ayaway a cyaw-hwang-Ke-lyeke-ci-s, mapaculcul tayza i Luma cyaw-tin mikawaw, 1084 a mihcaan nu cyaw-hwang a piculcul mumul Te-kow micuay masasuayaw tu cyaw-cung-ke-men-san-se. U-al-pan-al-s katukuh i sen-sen-Low-ma-tikow zikuz, maala ku sapilusimet tu ciwlu a kiwkay a situngus tu pasubana' atu hungti ku mikuwanay a bunday nu hekalay atu labuay. kasitungu pasubana' ci Ke-li-ke-ci-ci-s u cayay pitantanan amibaking tu cu-cyaw hamin han paales, hungti ku mikuwanay tu kawaw, mademec ku sen-sen Low-ma-tikow hungti ci Heng-li-se-se atu Ke-lay-mung-san-s atu zuma kaput. napacuwahan tuyni, ci U-al-pan-al-se mapala u sakakaay a cu-cyaw nu Aw-s-ti-ya, i 1088 a mihca 3 a bulad 12 a dimiad mala cyaw-hwang. mala cyaw-hwang sayay ci U-al-pan-al-se caay kasitungus mikuwan tu Low-ma, makuwan nu sen-senLow-ma-ti-kow hungti Heng-li-se-se atu Ke-la-mung sanse. kilul ci U-al-pan-al-se malingatu atu cyaw-hwang madademec tu icelang, 1089 a mihcaan i Si-si-li-wang-kow now-man a piading nu hitay, saayaway micumud tu Low-ma, palecapu milubang tu cung-cyaw, sakamusa mabidang u hungti ku situngusay tu kawa nu kamisama. patahkal au mikawaway tu kamisama a tademaw atu mikilulay tu kamisama ku patahkalen, uyni a pingayaw mademec, lalum asa miliyas tu Low-ma a niyazu' panaay tu a mihcaan milakalak. pilakalakan ni U-al-pan-al-se miliyung tu micukelay ci Now-man a tademaw, misaupu tu icelangay a kuwang midemec tu Ke-lay-mung-sen-s, zuma milinlaku tu labuay a ti-kow mabidang ci Henli se-se tu pikuwan tu kung-how, miliyung tu picaluk a bunday pakalakalak tu kacacayat nu malawamaay a Heng-li, u wawa ni Heng-li ci Kang-la-te i 1093 a mihcaan miliyas tuwama, i Mi-lan misakaku sakay Wang-cye atu cyaw-hwang misakaput. 1096 a mihcaan, U-al-pan-al-se malaheci ku pidemec tu ada ci Ke-lay-mung-sen-se, panukas taluma' i Low-ma, I La-te-lan-kung palecapu milubang tu cung-cyaw u ada a sakaput hamin han paales.

== kakiliman == U-al-pan-al-se烏爾班二世 cen-bo-cyaw-conng U-al-pan-al-se "kamo no Latin, Beatos Urbanos PP. II, kamo no Ing-kow, Pope Urban II, 1042 a mihcaan-1099 a mihcaan 7 a bolad 29 a mih caan", paabelin aca to U-al-pan-al-se, oyaan a nganganci La-ze-liay a Aw-tow "Odo of Lagery". i Ba-kow Ma-en tokos no sa'wac a lecohen, ngangasawan o 1088 a mihcaan tolo a bolad 12 a demiad katokoh 1099 a mihca 7 a bolad 29 a demiad mala cyaw-cong. :Beatos Urbanos PP. II；英語:Pope Urban II；1042年—1099年7月29日), (Odo of Lagery). . nilacolan namala sakatosa co-cyaw no Lan-s , Ke-li-ni-ing-syo-s-ato yen-cang, no satalakaway no co-cyaw "somanahay ko zikoc ko co-cyaw", Low-ma ci-yaw-hwang "1088-1099 a mihcaan", cong-se-ci no sepatay a La-tin sipo. mala no Low-ma cyaw-hwang hawsa palecal to sakacecay ziwzika solit a hitay mingayaw, balaki to sa i Low-ma ko kalihalay maozip. 10042 a lecoh i Ba-kow no Ma-en tokos a sa'wac Ti-yong, no tizaay Ma-en tokos a sa'wac no Ti-yong o ilic no kakitaan a loma'. saayaw i1050 a mihcaan i La-s co-cyaway no tabakiay a kiwkay no cadodadan minanam, zikoz tayza I So-wa-song micodad, i 1055-1067 a mihcaan mala no La-s no pasobana'ay no miedapay to mikeliday no patododay. 1070 a mihcaan miliyas to La-s, micomod to Ke-li-ni-ing-siw-yen mala siw-s, migingkiw to ciwlo a codad, zikoz mala yen-cong to. 1079 a mihcaad ci U-al-pan-al-s kanamohan no ayaway a cyaw-hwang-Ke-lyeke-ci-s, mapacolcol tayza i Loma cyaw-tin mikawaw, 1084 a mihcaan no cyaw-hwang a picolcol momol Te-kow micoay masasoayaw to cyaw-cong-ke-men-san-se. U-al-pan-al-s katokoh i sen-sen-Low-ma-tikow zikoz, maala ko sapilosimet to ciwlo a kiwkay a sitongos to pasobana' ato hongti ko mikowanay a bonday no hekalay ato laboay. kasitongo pasobana' ci Ke-li-ke-ci-ci-s o cayay pitantanan amibaking to co-cyaw hamin han paales, hongti ko mikowanay to kawaw, mademec ko sen-sen Low-ma-tikow hongti ci Heng-li-se-se ato Ke-lay-mong-san-s ato zoma kapot. napacowahan toyni, ci U-al-pan-al-se mapala o sakakaay a co-cyaw no Aw-s-ti-ya, i 1088 a mihca 3 a bolad 12 a dimiad mala cyaw-hwang. mala cyaw-hwang sayay ci U-al-pan-al-se caay kasitongos mikowan to Low-ma, makowan no sen-senLow-ma-ti-kow hongti Heng-li-se-se ato Ke-la-mong sanse. kilol ci U-al-pan-al-se malingato ato cyaw-hwang madademec to icelang, 1089 a mihcaan i Si-si-li-wang-kow now-man a piading no hitay, saayaway micomod to Low-ma, palecapo milobang to cong-cyaw, sakamosa mabidang o hongti ko sitongosay to kawa no kamisama. patahkal ao mikawaway to kamisama a tademaw ato mikilolay to kamisama ko patahkalen, oyni a pingayaw mademec, lalom asa miliyas to Low-ma a niyazo' panaay to a mihcaan milakalak. pilakalakan ni U-al-pan-al-se miliyong to micokelay ci Now-man a tademaw, misaopo to icelangay a kowang midemec to Ke-lay-mong-sen-s, zoma milinlako to laboay a ti-kow mabidang ci Henli se-se to pikowan to kong-how, miliyong to picalok a bonday pakalakalak to kacacayat no malawamaay a Heng-li, o wawa ni Heng-li ci Kang-la-te i 1093 a mihcaan miliyas towama, i Mi-lan misakako sakay Wang-cye ato cyaw-hwang misakapot. 1096 a mihcaan, U-al-pan-al-se malaheci ko pidemec to ada ci Ke-lay-mong-sen-se, panokas taloma' i Low-ma, I La-te-lan-kong palecapo milobang to cong-cyaw o ada a sakapot hamin han paales.
